content.rendered:
OUR STORY

LULLY & ROSE is a boutique online florist, founded on a deep love and respect for the natural beauty of flowers, where your orders are lovingly created by owner and floral designer, Rachael.

 

 
 
 

This light-filled studio is a creative space that encompasses Rachael’s love for all things seasonal and locally grown. 

 

With over 11 years of industry experience, we work closely with Queensland flower wholesalers and micro growers throughout the Gold Coast Hinterland and the Northern NSW region, to source the freshest and
finest quality, where every flower is personally hand-selected by us, and lovingly designed.

 

 

 

Celebrated as Gold Coast’s best online florist,  LULLY & ROSE is a perfumed haven of premium flowers, indoor plants & thoughtfully curated Australian gifts.

 

Rachael’s love for flowers began in her childhood, with sweet memories shared with her Gran in her beautiful floral gardens, where garden roses were especially significant. Surrounded by perfumed flowers like sweet peas, freesias, lavender, and hydrangea, in the garden of their generational home in New Zealand, each garden rose carried a story from the original gardens of her Great Gran and Great Nana. These beloved memories instilled a love for florals that ultimately inspired Rachael to open her own studio, a space to share her love for flowers with others, adoring their lives with the beauty and emotion that they evoke.

The name LULLY & ROSE holds special meaning, derived from the unique nickname Rachael’s Grandad called her Gran – “Lully Bay Foot,” shortened to Lully. This name carries deep significance and is an integral part of the LULLY & ROSE story.

“The simplicity of gifting flowers is the inspiration behind our contemporary design at LULLY & ROSE. Throughout history, flowers have inspired art, poetry, and cultural traditions around the world, expressing emotions beyond words through the language of flowers. The beauty of each season lies in its ability to capture the pure essence of nature, infusing life and elegance into your home. Our minimalist finishing style allows the flowers to speak for themselves, conveying emotions and curating connections across distances.”

Our vision is to inspire others by showcasing the simplicity and natural beauty of flowers. Each design is uniquely curated and made with love by owner and floral designer, Rachael.

SHOP OUR RANGE
SHOP OUR RANGE
